Description

Calculation of a new topographic index to quantify downslope controls on local drainage. References: - Hjerdt, K.N., McDonnell, J.J., Seibert, J. Rodhe, A. (2004): 'A new topographic index to quantify downslope controls on local drainage', Water Resources Research, 40
